dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4033 : National Geologic Mapping Act Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Geologic Mapping Act Reauthorization Act .

section.header: Reauthorization of National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992

paragraph.text: Section 9(a) of the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992 (43 U.S.C. 31h(a)) is amended by striking 2018 and inserting 2023.

Section 4(b)(1) of the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992 (43 U.S.C. 31c(b)(1)) is amended by striking Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 each place it appears in subparagraphs (A) and (B) and inserting National Geologic Mapping Act Reauthorization Act .

subsection.text: Section 5(a)(3) of the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992 (43 U.S.C. 31d(a)(3)) is amended by striking Associate Director for Geology and inserting Associate Director for Core Science Systems.
Section 3 of the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992 (43 U.S.C. 31b) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking section 6(d)(3) and inserting section 4(d)(3);
in paragraph (5), by striking section 6(d)(1) and inserting section 4(d)(1); and
in paragraph (9), by striking section 6(d)(2) and inserting section 4(d)(2).

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 13, 2018.
